Tucson embraces Talon passionately holding her close to his chest.  He had =
finally gathered the courage to ask her hand in eternal bond. His spark bea=
ting a mile a minute, he couldn't help but share his joy with her, yet doin=
g so in an innocent way.  He closes his eyes for a moment with a smile on h=
is face.

" I love you with all my spark, that will never change, and no on=
e will ever take that away from us."

Outside, Uproar catches up to Lord El=
der, as he observes the private code on Tuscons door.

" Wow, so, I guess T=
ucson and Talon are kinda gonna be like Rodimus and Nightlight.  I wonder i=
f Tucson will ya know..  Have a family of his own some day?"

Moving to Leg=
acy's quarters, Straight Shot thinks for a moment before saying anything, w=
hich was her best of traits.  Once she had an idea of what she wanted to sa=
y, she looks up to Legacy, with an air of sincerity she always had for ever=
yone, including her brother.

" Thanks, for letting me talk to you, I appre=
ciate it.  I just wanted ta let ya know that I think my brother doesn't qui=
te understand where you're coming from and maybe that's why he's so critica=
l of your actions.  He's always been like that, not just around you, but wi=
th me too, and yeah, sometimes it gets on my nerves.  But with things as th=
ey are, and what happened ta him in the past, I can kind of see why he's pu=
t up such a defense and why he's so determined ta think off the pavement.  =
And maybe that's why his personality clashes with yours.  It's clashed with=
 mine too, at times.  Honestly though, how do you feel about his thinking o=
utside the box?  Is there a reason why you'd rather not go that way?"
